name: Football
description: A team sport played between two teams of eleven players with a round ball that may not be touched or carried with the hands or arms during play.

name: Cricket
description: A bat-and-ball game played between two teams of eleven players on a field with a 22-yard pitch in the center.

name: Hockey
description: A team sport played on ice (ice hockey) or on a field (field hockey) where teams use sticks to hit a puck or ball into the opponent's goal.

name: Basketball
description: A team sport where two teams of five players each try to score points by throwing a ball through the opposing team's hoop.

name: Volleyball
description: A team sport in which two teams of six players each are separated by a net and attempt to score points by hitting a ball over the net and into the opponent's court.

name: Tennis
description: A racket sport played between two players (singles) or two teams of two players each (doubles), where players use a racket to hit a ball over a net into the opponent's court.
